On behalf of the administrative team of Sunnybrook SD 171, I want to thank everyone who took time out of their schedules to complete the parent survey. Please know, we read every comment. Your comments are valued and your child/children's overall safety is important to us. The survey results will be used to assist the district in developing our school reopening plan.

The survey results were as follows:

189 parents completed the survey

The top three modes of communication preferred were Robo calls, Classroom Dojo, and Google Classrooms

When asked if you were planning to send your child/children back to school:

42% said yes
39% indicated maybe
19% no

If the school offered a hybrid model would you be willing to send your child:

53% yes
28% maybe
17% no

Of the families who use district transportation to transport their child/children to and from school: 57% are willing to transport them themselves

Respectfully

Administrative Team
